comments: This professor is an approachable and real individual. She is fair in her grading methods, understanding but not to be taken advantage, respectful, and calm & collective. In a nutshell, you will get out of this class whatever you put into it. It is a writing intensive course but she gives you all the materials and guidance you need.

The exams are difficult, she admitted herself but if your attendance is stellar and you do the reaction papers, passing is easy. Got an A!

comments: If you just want an easy A take her class. But if you really want to learn and be involved this is not the class for you. She basis her lectures off of a PowerPoint from the textbook. Spends the entire class reading off the slides and talking briefly about the topic. H.W are chapters from the online textbook must answer 60 question per chapter.

comments: Professor Pastor is one of the nicest professors I\'ve ever had and she loves her field. She pretty easy to pass, show up, pay attention to PowerPoint slides and do not wait till the last minute to start your study guide. It\'s A LOT but it\'s easy. If your aren\'t good with it then READ YOUR TEXTBOOK!

comments: Just had her for this Fall 2015 semester and i must say she\'s amazing. Gives three tests, her lectures are very interesting, she\'s very respectful and responds to e-mails on time plus gives five points for good attendance. all you need to do is show up, do your work, and study for the tests. She\'s definitely my fav Psy professor.

comments: I took Prof. Pastor\'s PSY 100 for the Summer I session. I received a short 15 question, multiple-choice quiz weekly. The final exam was about 30 questions. Her class is clear and concise, and hands out study guides that match her tests. She also offers a written extra credit assignment. Material that was not reviewed in class was not on the tests.

stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  EXTRA CREDIT
comments: Prof Pastor is definitely one of the best professors teaching in BMCC. You have to work for your grade & study hard but any question you have she has the answer to. She truly wants to see her students pass & will help as much as she possibly can as she gives extra credit which saved me & helped me get an A. I\'ll be taking her again without a doubt!

comments: Professor Pastor is an amazing Professor. She is very helpful as well as easy. In order to get good grade you need to summit all assignments in time and regular to class. There is no class tests during the whole semester, only the final. Also she provides the study guide before the final which is really helpful.
